contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Orzinuovi | official_name = Città di Orzinuovi | native_name = | image_skyline = 941Orzinuovi.JPG | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Orzinuovi-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 24 |lats = 12 |latNS = N | longd = 9 |longm = 55 |longs = 30 |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT_type:city(12029) | coordinates_display = inline, title | coordinates_footnotes = <ref name="world gazetteer">{{cite web | url=http://www.world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?men=gpro&des=gamelan&geo=487494992 | title=The World Gazetteer | accessdate=2007-02-22}}</ref> | region = [[Lombardy]] | province = [[province of Brescia|Brescia]] (BS) | frazioni = Barco, Pudiano, Ovanengo, Coniolo | mayor_party = | mayor = Andrea Ratti | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 48 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 11641 | population_as_of = December 31, 2004 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Orceani | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 81 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = St. Bartholomew | day = August 24 | postal_code = 25034 | area_code = 030 | website = {{official website|http://www.comune.orzinuovi.bs.it}} | footnotes = }} '''Orzinuovi''' is a town and ''[[comune]]'' in the [[province of Brescia]], in [[Lombardy]], [[Italy]]. ==History== It was founded in 1193 as a boundary fortress with a statute of the ''[[comune]]'' of [[Brescia]], with the name of "Orci Novi". Its history thenceforth closely follows that of Brescia, therefore sharing the [[Republic of Venice|Venetian]] dominion from 1466 until Venice's demise in 1797. It then was part of [[Napoleon I|Napoleon]]'s Italian states until 1815, then within [[Kingdom of Lombardy-Venetia]] ( part of the [[Austrian Empire]]) until the [[Second Italian Independence War]]. From 1860 it has been part of [[Italy]]/[[Kingdom of Italy (1861–1946)|Kingdom of Italy]]. ==''Frazioni''== *''Coniolo'' ([[Eastern Lombard language|Eastern Lombard]]: ''Cuniöl'') *''Barco'' *''Pudiano'' *''Ovanengo'' *''Rossa'' ==See also== *[[Orceana Calcio]] ==Sources== {{Reflist}} ==Photos== <BR> {{commons category}} {{Province of Brescia}} ==External links== *[http://www.comuni-italiani.it/017/125/mappa.html], maps of Orzinuovi [[Category:Cities and towns in Lombardy]] [[Category:1193 establishments]] [[Category:Populated places established in the 10th century]] {{Lombardy-geo-stub}}
